      • canCapture

        public boolean canCapture(Piece attacker,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Determines if inputted piece can capture what is at the position x and y
        Parameters:
        attacker - attacking piece
        x - x coordinate of attacked position
        y - y coordinate of attacked position
        Returns:
        true if attacker can capture a piece at location

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        p - the Piece to check
        Returns:
        true if the piece can move, false if not

        Returns:
        king object of player, null if error

      • isInCheck

        public boolean isInCheck(java.lang.String color)
        Checks if the player of set color is in check. Finds their King, and sees if it is capturable by any pieces of the opposite color. If it can be, return true.
        Parameters:
        color - color of player in question
        Returns:
        true if player is in check, false if not or error

        Returns:
